song.title: Shades of Night 3 (Star Gazing)
song.info: Shades of night III - Star gazing - tracked by basehead, mental design/klf/ice samples 1, 2, 4, 11, 20-23, 26, 27 are mine. please, don't rip these. also, do not use samples 13-15, which are by my bud timelord, who would appreciate them not to be stolen... thank you... my samples are from x-static goldmine (cd-2), berlin 1992/tresor (cd), SWR/Majesty (dub), vocfx (mic), enigma c.o.c. (cd). other samples from vogue, nhp, pm, moby, rcramer, otis, greg, krystall, lpeg, shadowh, nemesis. big, big thanx to Lord Pegasus/RELiC/KLF(!) for letting me take a few of his riffs on which the fast part of this trak were remixed with, and constructed around. thanks again... yer toons roq. =) greetings to all KLF bruvahs, esp mael, nec, and khy... everybody on IRC... all ambient/prog.houz fans out there... anybody who has emailed me feedback on my music, and all those people out there whos muzik beats my ass inside-out =) quick greetz to zodiak/cda glad u liked the samps from son2 =) finally... i hope this track was worth all the hype of the second in the series... i got alot of feedback on it... mostly good, some bad. i don't know if this one tops it... its certainly something different......... anyway, enjoy it.... (c)bh/1994! - october 22/23
